Colonize Prologue is a combination of survival game and building strategy that takes place during the colonization period - the 17th century. It tells the story of
a settlement in the new world and all the difficulties encountered by the early settlers.

Overview


Colonize Prologue is a building simulation and it centers on the economy, management of groups of the population, city management. It is an isometric classic. The player gradually builds a settlement, a city that has a character of a city-state, with everything that goes with it.



External missions are another feature that will increase your experience. The player chooses a mission in his city in the respective building, chooses 5 inhabitants for the mission, and sends them into the wilderness!



Colonize Prologue is an intro to a full feature game. You can play our first map - Plymouth, and experience a small portion of what will be done in the full feature COLONIZE game, that we will publish in 2022.

Key features


  • The player fights against hunger and weather!
  • Trade with the King!
  • The external missions that will expand your game!


This game is supported using public funding by the Slovak Arts Council.
